episode27.name: 27   Basketball Woes and the Coaching Carousel
episode27.description: Arkansas' basketball had a terrible week on the court with two back breaking losses. We also talk about the coaching changes occurring for Bret Bielema and the football program.
episode27.summary: A lot has happened since the last time the crew was in the studio.  The wheels are wobbling on the Razorback basketball team's season.  How was Ole Miss able to invade Walton Arena and drill the Hogs? Is  the home court aura of invincibility gone?  Just because it's basketball season doesn't mean that there's no  football news, however. Hog Cast favorite Jim Chaney has left for the  greener pastures of Pittsburgh. What's the fallout of this decision  and how does it affect the status of K.J. Hill?
episode27.keywords: Arkansas,SEC,Football, SEC West, WPS, The Hog Cast, Basketball
